Content:: The Libya Observer (Arabic: ليبيا أوبزرفر) is an English and Arabic online daily newspaper based in Tripoli, Libya,[1] created in 2015.[2] The Libya Observer claims to have evolved from online social media news articles, first published in April 2014, into a more conventional online newspaper in July 2015.[2] The chief editor is Abdullah Ibrahim.[1] Freedom House used articles by Libya Observer as a major source of information on Libyan Internet freedom in 2018.[3]  This African newspaper-related article is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
Title: The Libya Observer - Wikipedia
